docs.title: Welcome to the CTDC Documentation Site
docs.text:
This website contains a library of tutorials for exploring data within the Clinical and Translational Data Commons (CTDC) and conducting analysis using the connected cloud resource, the Cancer Genomics Cloud (CGC).

Explore CTDC DataConduct Anaylysis in the CGC

docs.title: About
docs.text:
The Clinical and Translational Documentation site is intended to serve as a complimentary resource for those looking to better understand how to use the CTDC to find data of interest, build cohorts, and use public tools and apps within the Cancer Genomics Cloud to conduct analysis using files exported from the CTDC.

If you wish to contribute a tutorial, please contact CTDCHelpDesk@nih.gov
